item.title: Watch: 4000 march against George Floyd killing in Auckland
item.description:
New Zealand protesters have today joined thousands of Americans demonstrating against the killing of Minneapolis man George Floyd in a protest starting from Aotea Square in central Auckland.
An estimated ...

item.title: Rain hardly dents Auckland water shortage
item.description:
Storms which drenched Queen's Birthday holidaymakers and caused floods in parts of the country have barely dented Auckland's water shortage.
